channel.title: What version I'm on?
channel.description:
I'm currently not signed for any beta on steam but does this already contain the the latest surface tension update 0.3.0 ?
how do I check on what version I'm currently on ?

item.title: What version I'm on?
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
Yes, the latest stable version of Black Mesa includes STU. Quite for some time actually, almost a year to be precise.

Read full topic
